In one of your later podcasts Quinns Matt spoke about going back to old boardgames such as Talisman and Space Hulk. I've never heard how you guys experienced Talisman so how was it? Any different than before?

love the vibe you created with this list. Different from the ways I've been flowing to lofi/chillhop so I'm following.
